scripts.codegen:goerli: mustache ../../config/goerli.js template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache ../../config/goerli.js src/constants/index.template.ts > src/constants/index.ts && graph codegen
scripts.codegen:mainnet: mustache ../../config/mainnet.js template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache ../../config/mainnet.js src/constants/index.template.ts > src/constants/index.ts && graph codegen
